entropy.configuration.parser

Class FileConfigurationSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • entropy.configuration.parser.FileConfigurationSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationSerializer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlainTextConfigurationSerializer

    public abstract class FileConfigurationSerializer
extends Object
implements ConfigurationSerializer
    A wrapper to provide serialization and de-serialization to and from a file.
    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier

      • read

        public final entropy.configuration.Configuration read(String path)
                                               throws IOException,
                                                      ConfigurationSerializerException
        Read a configuration from a file.
        Parameters:
        path - the file
        Returns:
        the configuration
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurred while reading the file
        ConfigurationSerializerException - if an error occurred while parsing the file

      • write

        public final void write(entropy.configuration.Configuration cfg,
         String path)
                 throws IOException
        Write a configuration to a file. If the parent folder does not exists, it is created.
        Parameters:
        cfg - the configuration to write
        path - of the file
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurred while writing the file
